task: Develop a basic 'Paperboy' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Don't be frightened of cliches'.
name: Paper Route Frenzy

branding_data.short_description: Deliver newspapers on a wild and chaotic paper route in this exciting arcade-style game.
branding_data.detailed_description: Paper Route Frenzy is a thrilling arcade game where players take on the role of a paperboy tasked with delivering newspapers to subscribers while navigating a bustling neighborhood. Embracing the classic elements of the original 'Paperboy' game, this version adds a twist by leaning into familiar gaming clichés. Players must dodge obstacles such as barking dogs, oncoming traffic, and quirky neighborhood characters while ensuring timely newspaper delivery. The game features vibrant, cartoonish graphics and a dynamic soundtrack that enhances the fast-paced, humorous gameplay. With each successful delivery, players earn points and unlock new challenges, making each playthrough unique and engaging.
